Text: No probs!  Thanks for taking the time to download these 4 movies.  They're all great and fun movies to watch!  I've seen them all that many times I've lost count, watching Gene Wilder and Richard Pryor together in a movie is just priceless now.  It's a shame they never did any others, there's some good ones that Gene did on his own and Richard did also, I guess really download those also.  What I like about these films is you never get bored with this stuff, you can just watch it again and again and again and again! lol
It's both PAL and region free? Does that mean it can be played on an NTSC dvd player?

@djd099: I'm not sure really, yes these movies are now region free dvds and they're PAL format for Europe but I guess it depends on your DVD player to whether it can support that particular format.  Just try it if you're not sure, they'll either work or they won't, I would try it but I have a PAL DVD player region free as I live in Europe..
